title: Whittaker Modules for W type Cartan Lie superalgebras
summary:
We consider the category of Whittaker modules for the Lie superalgebra $W_{m,n}$ of vector fields on $\mathbb{C}^{(m|n)}$. For any $\mathbf{a}\in \mathbb{C}^m$ we show the equivalence between the blocks
  $Ω_{\mathbf a}^{\widetilde{W}_{m,n}}$ of the category of $(AW)_{m,n}$-Whittaker modules with finite-dimensional Whittaker vector spaces and the category of finite-dimensional modules over certain Lie subsuperalgebra $T_{m,n}$ of $(AW)_{m,n}$ (and also of $\mathfrak{gl}{(m,n)})$. Then we apply the covering technique to study Whittaker $W_{m,n}$-modules and describe simple modules in the category $Ω_{\mathbf a}^{{W}_{m,n}}$ of such modules with finite-dimensional Whittaker vector spaces and with non-singular ${\mathbf a}$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Lie超代数$W_{m,n}$的Whittaker模范畴，证明了$(AW)_{m,n}$-Whittaker模的块$\Omega_{\mathbf{a}}^{\widetilde{W}_{m,n}}$与Lie子超代数$T_{m,n}$的有限维模范畴等价，并应用覆盖技术描述了非奇异$\mathbf{a}$下具有有限维Whittaker向量空间的$W_{m,n}$-模范畴$\Omega_{\mathbf{a}}^{W_{m,n}}$中的单模。
AI.motivation: 研究向量场Lie超代数$W_{m,n}$的Whittaker模表示理论，建立Whittaker模范畴与有限维代数模范畴的等价关系，并分类特定范畴中的单模。
AI.method: 1. 对于任意$\mathbf{a}\in\mathbb{C}^m$，证明$(AW)_{m,n}$-Whittaker模块$\Omega_{\mathbf{a}}^{\widetilde{W}_{m,n}}$与Lie子超代数$T_{m,n}$的有限维模范畴等价；2. 应用覆盖技术（covering technique）研究$W_{m,n}$-Whittaker模，描述范畴$\Omega_{\mathbf{a}}^{W_{m,n}}$中具有非奇异参数$\mathbf{a}$的单模结构。
AI.result: 1. 建立了$(AW)_{m,n}$-Whittaker模块与$T_{m,n}$（$\mathfrak{gl}(m,n)$的子代数）有限维表示范畴的等价性；2. 完整分类了非奇异参数$\mathbf{a}$下$W_{m,n}$-Whittaker模范畴$\Omega_{\mathbf{a}}^{W_{m,n}}$中的单模。
AI.conclusion: 通过范畴等价和覆盖技术，系统刻画了$W_{m,n}$超代数的两类Whittaker模结构，为无限维Lie超代数表示理论提供了新工具和分类结果。

title: The quantum torus as an $\mathbb E_M$-category
summary: Given an oriented $2$-manifold $M$, a locally constant sheaf of lattices $Λ$ over $M$, and a pointed morphism $q : \textsf B^2Λ\rightarrow \textsf B^4\mathbf C^{\times}$, we define an $\mathbb E_M$-category $\mathrm{Rep}_q(\check T)$ which we call the "quantum torus" at level $q$. We explain why this terminology is deserved and calculate the factorization homology of $\mathrm{Rep}_q(\check T)$. When $M$ arises from a global complex curve, we confirm (a version of) a conjecture of Ben-Zvi and Nadler for tori.

AI.tldr: 该论文定义了一个称为‘量子环面’的E_M-范畴结构，并计算了其分解同调，验证了Ben-Zvi和Nadler关于环面的猜想。
AI.motivation: 为了在给定定向2-流形上，通过常值格层和特定态构建量子环面结构，并探索其分解同调性质。
AI.method: 基于定向2-流形M、局部常值格层Λ和映射q，定义了E_M-范畴Rep_q(检查T)，并计算其分解同调。
AI.result: 成功构建量子环面结构并计算其分解同调，当M源于复曲线时验证了Ben-Zvi-Nadler猜想（变体）。
AI.conclusion: 该方法有效实现了量子环面的范畴化描述，为复几何背景下的相关猜想提供了证明。

title: Classification of simple commutative algebras in the Delannoy category
summary: The Delannoy category is an interesting pre-Tannakian category associated to the oligomorphic group $\mathbb{G}$ of automorphisms of the totally ordered set $(\mathbf{R}, <)$. By construction, it admits some obvious simple commutative algebras, corresponding to certain transitive $\mathbb{G}$-sets. We show that these account for all of the simple commutative algebras in the Delannoy category. Previous results of this kind have been limited to interpolation categories; since the Delannoy category cannot be obtained by interpolation, new methods are required.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Delannoy范畴中所有简单交换代数的问题。该范畴与全序集(ℝ, <)的自同构群ℕ相关。作者证明了该范畴中明显的交换代数（对应某些传递ℕ-集）构成了所有简单交换代数。由于Delannoy不能通过插值获得，因此提出了新方法。
AI.motivation: Delannoy范畴是一个有趣的前Tannakian范畴，它与全序集(ℝ, <)的自同构群ℕ相关。前人研究局限于插值范畴，而Delannoy无法通过插值获得，因此需要新方法来研究其简单交换代数结构。
AI.method: 通过分析范畴结构，证明了范畴中存在的明显简单交换代数（对应某些传递ℕ-集）已经穷尽了所有可能。由于范畴无法通过插值构造，作者开发了新的数学方法。
AI.result: 证明了Delannoy范畴中所有简单交换代数都来自该范畴已知的明显构造（特定传递ℕ-集对应的交换代数）。
AI.conclusion: 本文确定了Delannoy范畴中简单交换代数的完整分类，突破了以往插值范畴研究的局限，为此类非插值范畴的研究提供了新途径。

title: The Superization of Hochschild's Lemma and Restricted Lie-Rinehart Superalgebras
summary: The main goal of this paper is to introduce the notion of restricted Lie-Rinehart superalgebra over a field of characteristic $p>2$, motivated by a generalization of Hochschild's lemma to the super setting. We extend Schauenburg's proof of Hochschild's lemma to Lie-Rinehart superalgebras and we prove a superized version that serves as a foundation for our construction. Building upon this, we define restricted Lie-Rinehart superalgebras, investigate their representations, construct the semi-direct product with a restricted module, and provide several examples. Finally, we construct the corresponding universal enveloping algebra and show that this algebra satisfies the expected universal property.

AI.tldr: 引入特征p>2的域上受限Lie-Rinehart超代数概念，推广Hochschild引理至超代数情形，建立限制结构研究表示和构造泛包络代数
AI.motivation: 将Hochschild引理推广至超代数结构，建立特征p>2域上Lie-Rinehart超代数的限制结构
AI.method: 扩展Schauenburg的Hochschild引理证明至Lie-Rinehart超代数，定义受限版本，研究其表示理论，构造半直积和泛包络代数
AI.result: 成功定义受限Lie-Rinehart超代数，证明其泛包络代数具有标准泛性质
AI.conclusion: 建立受限Lie-Rinehart超代数系统理论框架，为特征p域的超代数结构提供新工具

title: Parametric Algorithms for the 5-Modular Analog of ES (Sierpiński): Structure of Solutions, Parameterization, and Constructive Proofs (SERP)
summary:
We consider the problem of representing the fraction $5/P$ as a sum of three distinct unit fractions $1/A+1/B+1/C$ with $A<B<C$ and $A,B,C\in\mathbb{N}$. The case of primes $P\equiv 1 \pmod{5}$ is analyzed, where two constructive types of solutions arise: ED1 (exactly one denominator divisible by $P$, namely $C=cP$) and ED2 (exactly two denominators divisible by $P$, namely $B=bP$ and $C=cP$). Parametric constructions and enumeration algorithms are developed, including explicit transitions between ED1 and ED2.
  A deterministic algorithm is proposed, based on the intersection of a parametric lattice defined by pairs $(α,d')$ with bounded boxes. For each fixed prime $P\equiv 1 \pmod{5}$ the algorithm constructively produces a solution. Using analytic methods such as the Bombieri--Vinogradov theorem and the Chebotarev density theorem, it is shown that the density of admissible parameters is high, which yields polylogarithmic search complexity in the average case. A strict complexity guarantee for all primes remains conditional and depends on the finite covering hypothesis.
  This study extends previous work for coefficient $4$ (the Erdős--Straus conjecture) to coefficient $5$, transferring the same structure of parametrization and constructive solutions. Analytic applications provide averaging tools used for density estimates in parametric boxes.

AI.tldr: 提出一种算法，用于将分数5/P表示为三个不同单位分数之和，针对模5余1的素数P。分析两种解法类型（ED1和ED2），并开发参数化构造和枚举算法。利用解析方法证明平均情况下具有对数多项式搜索复杂度。
AI.motivation: 将Erdős-Straus猜想（系数4）的研究扩展到系数5的情形，研究5/P分解为三个不同单位分数之和的问题，特别是当P为模5余1的素数时。
AI.method: 1）分析ED1型（分母中仅C被P整除）和ED2型（分母中B、C被P整除）的解法构造；2）建立参数化构造及ED1/ED2间的转换算法；3）基于参数化网格与有界盒的交集设计确定性算法；4）使用Bombieri-Vinogradov定理和Chebotarev密度定理进行密度分析。
AI.result: 1）算法能构造性生成任意给定P≡1 mod 5的解；2）证明平均搜索复杂度为对数多项式；3）严格复杂度保证依赖有限覆盖假设。
AI.conclusion: 成功将系数4情形的参数化结构迁移到系数5问题，解析工具为参数盒密度估计提供支持。算法的平均效率已证明，但严格复杂度仍依赖未证假设。

title: Invitation to finite groups
summary: This is an introduction to the finite groups, with focus on the groups of permutations and reflections, and more generally, on the finite groups of unitary matrices. We first discuss the basics of group theory, featuring the cyclic, dihedral and symmetric groups, and the structure result for finite abelian groups. Then we study the complex reflection groups, with general theory and examples, classification results, and with a look into braid groups too. We then go into the study of representation theory, and of more advanced aspects, such as Tannakian duality, Brauer theorems and Clebsch-Gordan rules. Finally, we discuss, using representation theory methods, a number of advanced analytic aspects, for the most in relation with questions coming from probability.

AI.tldr: 该论文介绍了有限群，重点关注置换群和反射群，以及更一般的有限酉矩阵群。讨论了群论基础，包括循环群、二面体群和对称群，以及有限阿贝尔群的结构结果。研究了复反射群的分类及相关理论，涉及辫子群。探讨了表示理论的高级主题，如Tannakian对偶、Brauer定理和Clebsch-Gordan规则。最后，使用表示论方法分析了概率论中的高级解析问题。
AI.motivation: 研究有限群及其表示理论，旨在理解有限群（特别是置换群、反射群和酉矩阵群）的结构与性质，并将这些理论应用于高级分析问题，尤其是来自概率论的课题。
AI.method: 从群论基础（循环群、二面体群、对称群、有限阿贝尔群结构）出发，扩展到复反射群的分类与理论（含辫子群），深入探讨表示理论（Tannakian对偶、Brauer定理、Clebsch-Gordan规则），最后结合表示论解决概率论中的解析问题。
AI.result: 建立了从有限群基础到复反射群分类的完整知识体系，提供了表示理论在高级数学（如Tannakian对偶、Clebsch-Gordan规则）和跨学科应用（概率论相关解析问题）中的方法论框架。
AI.conclusion: 有限群（尤其是置换群、反射群）及其表示理论构成了理解对称性的有力工具，该框架不仅能解决纯数学问题（如群分类、表示分解），还能为概率论等应用领域提供新的解析方法。

title: Explicit Burgess inequalities for cubefree moduli
summary: Burgess proved that for $χ_q$ a primitive Dirichlet character modulo $q$ with $q$ cubefree, $\Big|\sum_{M< n\le M+N}χ_q(n)\Big| \ll N^{1-\frac{1}{r}}q^{\frac{r+1}{4r^2}+ε}$ for all integers $r\ge1.$ More recently, explicit versions with prime moduli $q$ were computed by Booker, McGown, Treviño, and Francis, with applications to finding the least $k$-th power residue, and bounding the size of Dirichlet $L$-functions just to name a few. Jain-Sharma, Khale, and Liu proved an explicit estimate for $r=2.$ We improve their explicit constant for $r = 2$ and compute an explicit Burgess bound for cubefree $q$ for $r\ge 3$.

AI.tldr: 改进并显式计算了立方自由模数q的Burgess边界。
AI.motivation: 虽然之前已有工作针对素数模数给出了显式的Burgess不等式，并对r=2的情况进行了显式估计，但本文旨在改进r=2的显式常数，并首次为立方自由模数q的r≥3情况提供显式Burgess界。扩展了显式结果的应用范围。
AI.method: 在Burgess原始证明的基础上改进关键技术点并显式计算常数。结合立方自由模数的特性，通过更精细的数学推导和显式常数估计推广了Booker等人以及Jain-Sharma等人的结果。
AI.result: 1. 针对r=2情况改进了Jain-Sharma等人的显式常数；2. 针对r≥3情况首次给出了立方自由模数q的显式Burgess界（具体常数未在摘要中给出）。
AI.conclusion: 本研究为立方自由模数的特征和提供了更优的显式上界，特别是在r≥3的情况填补了空白，这些改进的显式结果在数论问题（如最小k次剩余、Dirichlet L函数估计）中具有直接应用价值。

title: On (super)symmetrizing forms and Schur elements of cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford algebras
summary: In this paper, we introduce Schur elements for supersymmetrizing superalgebras. We show that the cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford algebra $\mathcal{H}^f_{c}(n)$ is supersymmetric if $f=f^{(\mathtt{0})}_{\underline{Q}}$ and, symmetric if $f=f^{(\mathtt{s})}_{\underline{Q}}$ and an invertibility condition holds. In the semisimple case, we compute the Schur elements for both $\mathcal{H}^f_{c}(n)$ and the cyclotomic Sergeev algebra $\mathcal{h}^g_{c}(n)$. As applications, we define new symmetrizing forms on the Hecke-Clifford algebra $\mathcal{H}(n)$ and on the cyclotomic quiver Hecke algebras of types $A^{(1)}_{e-1}$ and $C^{(1)}_e$.

AI.tldr: 引入超对称化超代数的Schur元素，证明了当f满足特定条件时，cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford代数是超对称或对称的，并在半单情形下计算了该代数及cyclotomic Sergeev代数的Schur元素。应用包括在Hecke-Clifford代数和两类cyclotomic quiver Hecke代数上定义新的对称形式。
AI.motivation: 扩展超对称代数的Schur元素理论至cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford代数，探索其对称性质及在相关代数上的应用。
AI.method: 通过代数表示理论，分析特定条件下$‮‮\mathcal{H}^f_c(n)$的超对称性，并在半单情形下显式计算Schur元素；推广至cyclotomic Sergeev代数$\mathcal{h}^g_c(n)$。
AI.result: 当$f=f^{(‮‮\mathtt{0})}_{\underline{Q}}$时$‮‮\mathcal{H}^f_c(n)$具超对称性；$f=f^{(‮‮\mathtt{s})}_{\underline{Q}}$且满足可逆条件时为对称。得出半单情形下Schur元素显式公式，并在Hecke-Clifford代数及A/C型cyclotomic quiver Hecke代数上构造新对称形式。
AI.conclusion: Schur元素理论成功应用于超对称化cyclotomic Hecke-Clifford代数，揭示了其对称结构，并为相关代数提供了新的对称形式构造方法。

title: Lower bound on Néron-Tate height of Abelian varieties
comment: Preliminary version, 14 pages, comments are welcome
summary: Let $A$ be an abelian variety defined over a number field $K$ and $\hat{h}$ be the Néron-Tate height on $A(\overline{K})$ corresponding to a symmetric ample line bundle on $A$. Let $\mathcal{K}/K$ be an asymptotically positive infinite extension as defined in \cite{AB-SK} which includes infinite Galois extensions with finite local degree at a non-archimedean place. In this article, we prove that the Néron-Tate height of non-torsion points in $A(\mathcal{K})$ is bounded below by an absolute constant depending only on $A$, $K$, and $\mathcal{K}$. As a consequence, we obtain the Bogomolov property for totally $p$-adic points of an abelian variety $A/\mathbb{Q}$ in the case when $A$ has good reduction at $p$. This is the first instance where such a result has been obtained in the good reduction case; previously, it was known only in the bad reduction case via Gubler's tropical equidistribution theorem. Moreover, our result also implies the finiteness of torsion points in $A(\mathcal{K})$.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在数域K上的阿贝尔簇A的无限扩张K中，A(K)中的非挠点的Néron-Tate高度有绝对正下界，从而得到Bogomolov性质。同时推得K中的挠点有限。
AI.motivation: 在阿贝尔簇的无限扩张中，研究Néron-Tate高度在非挠点上的下界问题，并将其与Bogomolov性质、挠点有限性建立联系。在已有工作仅限于bad reduction情形下，本研究首次处理了good reduction的情形。
AI.method: 引入渐近正无限扩张（包括有限局部度数的无限Galois扩张）的概念；建立Néron-Tate高度在A(mathcal K)中非挠点的统一正下界。
AI.result: 若K/K是渐近正无限扩张，则存在常数C(A,K,K)>0，使所有非挠点P满足hat h(P)≥C；推论1：对全局域上具有good reduction的阿贝尔簇，其totally p-adic点具有Bogomolov性质（此前仅知bad reduction情形）；推论2：A(mathcal K)的挠点有限。
AI.conclusion: 本工作首次在good reduction下证实了Bogomolov性质，突破了Gubler定理的限制；通过构建高度下界，同时解决了无限扩张中的挠点有限性问题。

title: Equivariant Koszul Duality, Modular Category $\mathcal{O}$, and Periodic Kazhdan--Lusztig Polynomials
summary: Let $G$ be a connected reductive algebraic group over an algebraically closed field of positive characteristic, $\mathfrak{g}$ be its Lie algebra, and $B$ be a Borel subgroup. We prove a formula for the dimensions of extension groups, in the principal block of the category of strongly $B$-equivariant $\mathfrak{g}$-modules (also called modular category $\mathcal{O}$), from a simple object to a costandard object, under the assumption that Lusztig's conjecture holds (which is known in large characteristic). The answer is given by a coefficient of a periodic Kazhdan--Lusztig polynomial associated with the corresponding affine Weyl group. Among other things, the proof uses a torus-equivariant version of the Koszul duality for $\mathfrak{g}$-modules constructed by the first author.

AI.tldr: 证明了在特征p>0的代数闭域上，连通约化代数群G的李代数𝔤的Borel子群B强等变𝔤模（或模版本O范畴）的主块中，从单对象到余标准对象的Ext群的维数公式。该公式由相应仿射Weyl群的周期Kazhdan-Lusztig多项式系数给出，并依赖于Lusztig猜想的成立（大特征时已知正确）。证明中使用了𝔤模的环面等变化版本的Koszul对偶性。
AI.motivation: 研究模版本范畴O中主块的扩展群结构（从单对象到余标准对象），旨在建立与特征0类似的Kazhdan-Lusztig多项式联系，为大特征情形提供理论工具。
AI.method: 1. 利用Lusztig猜想（在大特征成立）作为前提；2. 构造𝔤模的环面等变化Koszul对偶性；3. 结合仿射Weyl群的周期Kazhdan-Lusztig多项式描述Ext群维数。
AI.result: 得到了主块中Ext^n(简单对象,余标准对象)的维数等于相应周期KL多项式第n项系数的精确公式，建立了模表示论与KL理论的联系。
AI.conclusion: 该公式统一了模版本O范畴主块中扩展群的表述，证明了周期KL多项式对模表示结构的组合控制作用，拓展了Koszul对偶性在正特征情形的应用。

title: A $q$-analogue of the Koecher-Leshchiner generating function of odd zeta values
summary: In the 1980s, Koecher and, independently, Leshchiner found an elegant formula for the generating function of odd zeta values. In this short note, we derive a $q$-analogue of this formula, which provides a $q$-version of the accelerated series for $ζ(3)$ used by Apéry in his famous proof of irrationality.

AI.tldr: 这篇论文提出了Koecher和Leschiner发现的奇zeta值生成函数的q-模拟公式，该公式为Apéry证明ζ(3)无理性时使用的加速级数提供了q版本。
AI.motivation: Koecher和Leshchiner在1980年代发现了奇zeta值生成函数的优美公式。本文旨在推导该公式的q-模拟，扩展Apéry证明中使用的ζ(3)加速级数到q级数领域。
AI.method: 作者通过数学推导，对Koecher-Leshchiner公式进行q-模拟，构建了q版本的Apéry加速级数。具体方法涉及q-级数和特殊函数的理论。
AI.result: 成功推导出奇zeta值生成函数的q-模拟公式，获得了ζ(3)的q-加速级数表达式。
AI.conclusion: 该q-模拟公式不仅推广了经典结果，还为研究q-zeta值提供了新工具，可能在未来数论研究中具有应用潜力。

title: Height zero characters and Galois automorphisms
summary: Let $G$ be a finite group and let $p$ be a prime. In this paper, we prove a strengthened version of Brauer's height zero conjecture for the principal $p$-block of $G$ that takes the action of a certain group of Galois automorphisms into account. This answers a conjecture recently proposed by Malle, Moretó, Rizo and Schaeffer Fry. We then use this to obtain a structural result which can be seen as a Galois version of the Itô-Michler theorem.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了Brauer高度零点猜想的一个强化版本，考虑了Galois自同构群的作用，并回答了Malle等人提出的猜想。同时，得到了一个类似Itô-Michler定理的Galois结构结果。
AI.motivation: 为了改进Brauer的高度零点猜想，考虑Galois自同构群在有限群的主p-块上的作用，并验证Malle等人提出的新猜想。
AI.method: 通过增强Brauer高度零点猜想的证明框架，引入Galois自同构群的作用进行理论推导和严谨证明。
AI.result: 成功证明了Galois增强版的Brauer高度零点猜想，由此推导出一个类似Itô-Michler定理的群结构定理。
AI.conclusion: 该研究不仅解决了Malle等人的猜想，还为有限群的表示理论提供了新的Galois群作用视角，扩展了经典定理的应用范围。

title: Diophantine sets
summary: Diophantine subsets of $\mathbb{Z}$ play a key role in the negative answer to Hilbert's tenth problem. The definition of diophantine set generalizes in several ways to other commutative rings. We compare these definitions. Along the way, we prove that for every finitely presented scheme $Y$ over a ring $R$, there exists an affine $R$-scheme $X$ with a finitely presented $R$-morphism $X \to Y$ such that $X(R') \to Y(R')$ is surjective for every $R$-algebra $R'$.

AI.tldr: 该论文讨论了希尔伯特第十问题的否定解中起关键作用的$\mathbb{Z}$上的丢番图子集，并将其定义推广到其他交换环，比较了不同的推广方式。同时，证明了对环$R$上每个有限表示概形$Y$，存在一个仿射$R$-概形$X$及有限表示的$R$-态射$X\to Y$，使得对所有$R$-代数$R'$，$X(R') \to Y(R')$是满射。
AI.motivation: 推广$\mathbb{Z}$上丢番图子集的定义至交换环，比较不同定义间的差异。
AI.method: 通过构造仿射$R$-概形$X$与有限表示$R$-态射$X\to Y$，证明其诱导的点映射$X(R') \to Y(R')$的全局满射性质。
AI.result: 成功构造满足上述性质的仿射概形$X$，确保对任意$R$-代数$R'$，$X(R') \to Y(R')$均为满射。
AI.conclusion: 该推广完善了丢番图定义在交换环上的理论基础，并为相关问题的几何方法提供新工具。

title: Isomeric Heisenberg and Kac-Moody categorification I
summary: We develop a general framework for studying Abelian categories arising in isomeric representation theory, that is, representation theory broadly related to the supergroup Q(n). In this first part, we introduce notions of isomeric Heisenberg categorification and isomeric Kac-Moody categorication, and explain how to pass from the former to the latter. This is analogous to the passage from Heisenberg categorification to Kac-Moody categorification developed in our previous work with Webster.

AI.tldr: 提出了一个研究等度表示理论中阿贝尔范畴的通用框架，重点涉及超群Q(n)相关的表示理论。引入了等度海森堡分类和等度Kac-Moody分类的概念，并建立了从前者的分类方法。
AI.motivation: 旨在建立适用于等度表示理论（特别是与超群Q(n)相关）的范畴化理论框架，以统一处理该领域中的阿贝尔范畴结构问题。
AI.method: 引入等度海森堡范畴化和等度Kac-Moody范畴化两个核心概念，并构建从前者到后者的推导路径。该方法借鉴了先前工作中发展出的从海森堡范畴化导出Kac-Moody范畴化的思路。
AI.result: 成功构建了等度表示理论的范畴化框架，明确了两类新范畴（等度海森堡与等度Kac-Moody）的定义及转换机制。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为后续等度表示理论研究提供了基础工具，特别在超群Q(n)相关的范畴结构研究中具有应用前景。

title: Finiteness of function field-valued points on exceptional Shimura varieties
summary:
Let $C/k$ be a smooth curve over a finite field of characteristic $p>0$. We prove that there are finitely many principally polarized abelian schemes of given dimension $g$ over $C$ up to $p$-power isogeny. For curves over $\overline{k}$, we prove that the moduli space of such abelian schemes is finite type up to $p$-power isogeny.
  Moreover, we generalize this result to arbitrary (not necessarily abelian type) Shimura varieties $S$ and sufficiently large primes $p$ in terms of $S$: The space of generically ordinary morphisms $C\to S_{k}$ (resp. $C\to S_{\overline{k}})$ is finite (resp. finite type) up to $p$-Hecke orbits.

AI.tldr: 我们证明在有限域上给定光滑曲线 $C/k$ 时，存在有限多个主极化阿贝尔概形在同种关系 ($p$-power isogeny) 下的等价类。我们还推广此结果至任意志村簇 $S$，证明在足够大的素数 $p$ 下，映射 $C→ S_k$（或 $C→S_\overline{k}$）在 $p$-Hecke orbits 下是有限（或有限型）的。
AI.motivation: 研究有限特征域上曲线的阿贝尔概形及志村簇映射的有限性问题，特别是涉及 $p$-幂同种和 $p$-Hecke轨道的分类。
AI.method: 通过 $p$-adic 方法分析主极化阿贝尔概形的同种类，并推广到一般志村簇；利用“足够大素数 $p$”的条件处理 $p$-Hecke轨道上的有限性。
AI.result: 证明：（1）$C/k$上 $g$ 维主极化阿贝尔概形在 $p$-幂同种下有限；（2）在 $C/\overline{k}$ 上此类模空间在 $p$-幂同种下是有限型的；（3）推广到志村簇 $S$ 后，映射 $C→S_k$ 在 $p$-Hecke轨道下有限，$C→S_\overline{k}$ 下是有限型的。
AI.conclusion: 该工作建立了特征 $p>0$ 域上曲线与志村簇映射的强有限性定理，统一处理了阿贝尔簇和一般志村簇情形，并指出 $p$ 足够大时 $p$-Hecke轨道控制的分类空间具有有限性。

title: Stable equivalences and homological dimensions
comment: 29 pages. This is a revision of the part on stable equivalences in arXiv:2312.08794. New results are added. We stress that every finite-dimensional algebra over a field R is isomorphic to the centralizer of two matrices in a full matrix algebra over the field R. Thus the class of all centralizers of one matrix is an impotent part of finite-dimensonal algebras over fields
summary: As is known, every finite-dimensional algebra over a field is isomorphic to the centralizer algebra of two matrices. So it is fundamental to study first the centralizer algebra of a single matrix, called a centralizer matrix algebra. In this article, stable equivalences between centralizer matrix algebras over arbitrary fields are completely characterized in terms of a new equivalence relation on matrices. Moreover, stable equivalences of centralizer matrix algebras over perfect fields induce stable equivalences of Morita type, thus preserve dominant, finitistic and global dimensions. Our methods also show that algebras stably equivalent to a centralizer matrix algebra over a field have the same number of non-isomorphic, non-projective simple modules. Thus the Auslander--Reiten conjecture on stable equivalences holds true for centralizer matrix algebras.

AI.tldr: 研究任意域上中心化子矩阵代数的稳定等价性，并提出一种新的矩阵等价关系用于完全刻画这些稳定等价。此外，在完美域上，这种稳定等价诱导Morita型稳定等价，从而保持优势维数、有限主义维数和整体维数。论文还证明稳定等价于中心化子矩阵代数的代数具有相同数量的非同构非投射单模，从而验证了Auslander-Reiten猜想在这一类代数上的正确性。
AI.motivation: 由于有限维代数在同构意义下均可表示为两个矩阵的中心化子代数，因此研究单个矩阵的中心化子代数（即中心化子矩阵代数）是基础性的问题。本文旨在研究任意域上中心化子矩阵代数的稳定等价性，以及这种等价对代数不变量产生的影响。
AI.method: 通过引入一种新的矩阵等价关系（该文章未具体命名），用该等价关系刻画中心化子矩阵代数的稳定等价性；在完美域情况下，进一步证明这种稳定等价可诱导Morita型稳定等价，从而可保持若干同调维数。此外，基于稳定等价下非投射单模的数量不变性，验证了Auslander-Reiten猜想对这类代数的正确性。
AI.result: 完全刻画了任意域上中心化子矩阵代数的稳定等价性；在完美域情形下，证明了稳定等价可诱导Morita型稳定等价，从而保持优势维数、有限主义维数和整体维数；并证明稳定等价的两个中心化子矩阵代数具有相同数量的非同构非投射单模，因此这类代数满足Auslander-Reiten猜想。
AI.conclusion: 中心化子矩阵代数的稳定等价性可通过新定义的矩阵等价关系完全描述；在完美域上，这种等价关系足够强以至于保持重要同调维数；这类代数是Auslander-Reiten猜想成立的新范例。

title: Variations of the Hardy Z-Function and the Montgomery Pair Correlation Conjecture
summary: In 1973 Montgomery formulated the pair correlation conjecture, predicting that the local spacing statistics of the nontrivial zeros of the Riemann zeta function coincide with those of eigenvalues of large Hermitian matrices from the Gaussian Unitary Ensemble (GUE). The zeta function, however, is a fixed deterministic object, and the mechanism by which its zeros reproduce random matrix statistics has remained unclear. In this paper, assuming the Riemann Hypothesis, we prove Montgomery's pair correlation conjecture for the zeros of Hardy's $Z$-function. Building on earlier works, we use a finite-dimensional variational space of sections $Z_N(t;a)$ that approximate $Z(t)$ on each window $[2N,2N+2]$. Inside this space we define the real hall $\mathcal{RH}_N(\mathbb{R})$, consisting of those sections whose zeros in the corresponding critical rectangle are real, simple, and remain so along any homotopy from the core section. This real hall plays the role of a random matrix ensemble. Equipping it with a probability measure with smooth, strictly positive density on the coefficient space, we construct a Skorokhod-type stochastic differential equation with reflection at the discriminant boundary. We show that the induced dynamics of the unfolded zeros are, in the bulk, equivalent in law to Dyson Brownian motion with $β=2$, and by invoking modern universality results for Dyson Brownian motion and log-gases we obtain that, for any such measure, the ensemble-averaged local pair-correlation converges to the GUE sine-kernel law. Finally, using Selberg's probabilistic theory of the argument $S(t)$, we prove that the pair-correlation observables of the canonical approximants $Z_N(t;1)$ over disjoint windows behave asymptotically like decorrelated samples drawn from this GUE-distributed ensemble, and we upgrade the averaged GUE law to a deterministic pair-correlation law for the zeros of $Z(t)$.

AI.tldr: 证明蒙哥马利对关联猜想的简化版：在假设黎曼猜想成立的前提下，针对Hardy Z函数的零点，建立了其局部间距统计与高斯幺正随机矩阵特征值统计的一致性。
AI.motivation: 黎曼ζ函数的零点作为固定确定性对象，其为何能再现随机矩阵统计特性的机制尚不清楚。本文旨在揭示这一机制：通过构建有限维变分空间（称为实心厅）模拟GUE系综，证明Z函数零点的对关联统计服从GUE正弦核分布。
AI.method: 1. 使用分段插值函数Z_N(t;a)逼近Hardy Z函数；2. 定义实心厅RH_N(R)：包含所有在临界矩形内零点为实数、单根且沿同伦变换保持不变的截面对应的系数；3. 在实心厅上构造具有光滑正密度测度的反射型随机微分方程；4. 证明展开零点动态等价于β=2的戴森布朗运动；5. 利用对数气体普适性定理及Selberg的S(t)概率理论，将对关联统计收敛至GUE分布。
AI.result: 对任意实心厅上的光滑概率测度，系综平均的零点局部对关联服从GUE正弦核分布；且通过解相关分析，将平均结果提升为确定性Z函数零点的对关联律。
AI.conclusion: 首次从动力学角度建立确定性ζ函数零点与随机矩阵统计的内在联系，为理解蒙哥马利猜想提供了机制性解释。通过实心厅构造实现数学上的系综类比，技术上结合了随机微分方程、对数气体理论和变分逼近。

title: Lattices of pretorsion classes
summary: Since their introduction, torsion theories have played a key role in the study of abelian and pointed categories. In representation theory, torsion theories and lattices of torsion classes of mod$ A$, for $A$ a finite-dimensional algebra, have been widely studied. The more recent definition of pretorsion theories, that can be given for any category, has expanded the theory, giving many more instances of ``non-pointed torsion theories'' in unexpected settings. In this work, we introduce and study the lattice $\mathcal{L}_t(A)$ of pretorsion classes of mod$ A$. These lattices are in close connection with the lattices tors$ A$ of torsion classes of mod$ A$. We fully describe the completely join-irreducible elements of $\mathcal{L}_t(A)$. Moreover, we characterise and give a full classification of when $\mathcal{L}_t(A)$ is distributive and further describe when it can be identified with the \emph{distributive closure} of tors$ A$. Finally, we show how the lattices of pretorsion classes, together with their duals, can be used to build pretorsion theories in mod$ A$.

AI.tldr: 通过引入扭理论和前扭理论研究模代数的前扭类格结构，分析其不可约元素、分配性，并与扭类格的关系及在构造前扭理论中的应用
AI.motivation: 扭类在代数表示论中被广泛研究，但前扭类（适用于任意范畴）的理论为'非点扭理论'提供了更广泛的应用场景。本文研究模代数前扭类格的性质以拓展理论框架
AI.method: 定义并研究模代数A的前扭类格L_t(A)，分析其与扭类格tors A的联系。具体描述其完全并不可约元素特征，刻画分配性条件，分类与扭类格分配闭包的关系
AI.result: 完全描述L_t(A)的并不可约元素；分类L_t(A)为分配格的充要条件；当L_t(A)与扭类格的分配闭包可识别时给出完整分类
AI.conclusion: 前扭类格及其对偶结构可用于构造模代数中的扭理论，建立扭理论与前扭理论的格结构对应关系拓展了表示论工具

title: On the non-generic part of cohomology of compact unitary Shimura varieties of signature $(1,n)$
summary: In this short note, we prove a result about the non-generic part of the cohomology of certain compact unitary Shimura varieties for good $p$, partially extending a result of Boyer in the case of Harris--Taylor unitary Shimura varieties. Our arguments are different to those of Boyer -- we work in the context of the work of Fargues--Scholze, using ideas introduced by Koshikawa to study the generic part of cohomology.

AI.tldr: 在本文中，作者通过使用Fargues-Scholze的理论框架和Koshikawa提出的方法，扩展了Boyer关于Harris-Taylor酉Shimura簇在p良好条件下的上同调结果，重点关注非一般部分的上同调性质。
AI.motivation: 研究p良好条件下特定紧致酉Shimura簇上同调的非一般部分，部分扩展Boyer在Harris-Taylor酉Shimura簇上已有的成果。
AI.method: 采用Fargues-Scholze的工作框架，结合Koshikawa提出的研究一般部分上同调的思想，对非一般部分进行分析。
AI.result: 证明了一个关于特定酉Shimura簇在p良好条件下非一般部分上同调的结果。
AI.conclusion: 本文所提出的方法不同于Boyer的技术，在Fargues-Scholze架构中利用Koshikawa思想处理非一般部分，成功扩展了相关领域的研究成果。

title: Maass-Selberg relations for Whittaker functions on a real reductive group
summary: We give a complete proof of the Maass-Selberg relations for Whittaker integrals on a real reductive group. These relations were asserted In unpublished work of Harish-Chandra, and proven in the basic setting of maximal parabolic parabolic subgroups. Our proof is a reduction to the mentioned basic setting. It makes use of the action of standard intertwining operators on Whittaker distribution vectors in the generalized principal series of representations. The Maass-Selberg relations imply regularity of normalized Whittaker integrals. This is crucial for decent behavior of Fourier and wave packet transforms on the level of spherical Schwartz spaces.

AI.tldr: 提供了Maass-Selberg关系的完整证明，该关系最初由Harish-Chandra在未发表工作中提出，仅针对极大抛物子群的基本情形给出了证明。该证明通过将问题约简到基本情形，并利用标准交织算子在广义主序列表示的Whittaker分布向量上的作用，验证了关系式。这些关系保证了归一化Whittaker积分的正则性，进而确保球面Schwartz空间上傅里叶变换和波包变换的良好行为。
AI.motivation: 在实约群上建立Whittaker积分的Maass-Selberg关系，填补Harish-Chandra未发表工作的证明空白（原证明仅覆盖极大抛物子群的基本情形）。该关系是后续调和分析理论（如傅里叶变换）的基石。
AI.method: 1. 将问题约简至Harish-Chandra已解决的极大抛物子群基本情形；2. 通过标准交织算子在广义主序列表示的Whittaker分布向量上的作用实现约简。
AI.result: 严格证明了Maass-Selberg关系的普适性，并由此推出归一化Whittaker积分的正则性。
AI.conclusion: Maass-Selberg关系的完整证明为实约群上调和分析提供了关键工具，特别是确保了傅里叶变换及波包变换在球面Schwartz空间的良好定义。

title: Comparison between formal slopes and p-adic slopes
summary: In this paper, we establish several inequalities comparing formal slopes with p-adic slopes of solvable differential modules over the punctured open unit disc. Our approach is based on a delicate analysis of Newton polygons and the log-convexity of generic radius functions.

AI.tldr: 本文比较了可解微分模块在穿孔开单位圆盘上形式斜率与p-adic斜率的不等式,方法基于牛顿多边形和泛函半径函数对数凸性的分析。
AI.motivation: 研究微分模块形式斜率与p-adic斜率的比较关系,为相关理论提供基础支持。
AI.method: 通过精细分析牛顿多边形和泛函半径函数的对数凸性进行推导。
AI.result: 建立了多个不等式关系
AI.conclusion: 通过牛顿多边形与泛函半径函数分析,成功建立了形式斜率与p-adic斜率的比较不等式。

title: The shifted convolution problem for Fourier coefficients of Siegel modular forms of degree $2$
summary: We provide a power-saving bound for certain smoothed shifted convolution sums for Fourier coefficients of Siegel cusp forms. This result is the first nontrivial estimate for a shifted convolution sum with two cusp forms on a group of higher rank than $\GL_2$. Our approach is based on a novel automorphic reinterpretation of the delta method of Duke, Friedlander, and Iwaniec. The method reduces the problem to the estimation of Fourier coefficients of Siegel Poincare series, which is ultimately based on the Weil bound.

AI.tldr: 本文针对Siegel尖点形式的傅里叶系数，给出了特定平滑移位卷积和的节能界限。这是首次对高于$\GL_2$秩的群上两个尖点形式的移位卷积和给出非平凡估计。方法基于对Duke-Friedlander-Iwaniec delta方法的新颖自守重新诠释，将问题转化为估计Siegel Poincare级数的傅里叶系数，最终依赖于Weil界。
AI.motivation: 研究高阶秩群（如$\GL_n, n>2$）上尖点形式的移位卷积和问题，此前缺乏非平凡估计结果。本文旨在突破$\GL_2$的限制，为更高秩群的平滑移位卷积和建立有效估计。
AI.method: 1. 对DFI delta方法进行自守重新诠释\n2. 将原问题转化为Siegel Poincare级数的傅里叶系数估计问题\n3. 应用Weil界完成最终估计
AI.result: 首次获得$\GL_n(n>2)$群上双尖点形式平滑移位卷积和的非平凡幂节约界，扩展了经典DFI方法在高阶秩群的应用。
AI.conclusion: 本文发展的自守化delta方法为高阶秩群上的分析数论问题提供了新工具，所获结果有望在L函数理论等领域产生后续应用。
